name: Varus
title: the Arrow of Retribution
shortBio: One of the ancient darkin, Varus was a deadly killer who loved to torment his foes, driving them almost to insanity before delivering the killing arrow. He was imprisoned at the end of the Great Darkin War, but escaped centuries later in the remade flesh of two Ionian hunters—they had unwittingly released him, cursed to bear the bow containing his bound essence. Varus now seeks out those who trapped him, in order to enact his brutal vengeance, but the mortal souls within still resist him every step of the way.

skins.name: Blight Crystal Varus
skins.description: Wielding radiant mineral bows, three excavators dove into a cave of crystalline monsters. But only the grimly determined Varus emerged. While shattering the horrors that lurked in dark depths, they lost all grasp of time, sense, and self. Varus became an amalgam of crystal, monster, and man—now fracturing the world he once sought to make safe.

skins.name: Arclight Varus
skins.description: The archer Varus, bathed in the transcendental energies of the Arclight, found himself connected to a great cosmic wholeness more ancient than he had ever known. He now enforces this oneness, turning away entire armies long before they can ignite the flames of war.

skins.name: Arctic Ops Varus
skins.description: Varus leaps from the rampart, a hail of arrows flying from his bow and freezing the ground beneath his victims. As they struggle to regroup, he draws a missile—circuits flashing along its spine—and lets fly. Thanks for the archer, High Command!

skins.name: Heartseeker Varus
skins.description: Love hurts, and Varus is ready to prove it with a quiver full of romance and the seasoned eye of a veteran matchmaker. Angelic harps follow him across the world as he searches for unwitting lovebirds, who soon find their chests pierced by deadly heart-shaped arrowtips.

skins.name: Varus Swiftbolt
skins.description: Two archers cursed by an ancient, evil monster, Varus is roleplaying one archer cursed by an ancient, evil monster. It's not much of a departure for him, but Varus is way better at hunting Noxians than playing tabletop games.

skins.name: Dark Star Varus

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2020 Galaxies event.

skins.description: An interstellar titan containing multitudes within his eldritch mind, Varus serves the all-consuming Dark Star, a dread singularity born in the darkness of deep space. His arrival is a cataclysmic extinction event, erasing entire planetary systems as if they were never there.

skins.name: Conqueror Varus

descriptions.description: Loot exclusive gained during the 2019 MSI Event.

skins.description: Commemorating the 2018 Mid-Season Invitational in Europe.

skins.name: Infernal Varus

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2019.

skins.description: The Infernal Varus rips massive gouts of magma from the foundation of the earth, before firing them in volleys at those who would fight back against him. Each arrow lands with the ferocity of an exploding volcano, reducing all resistance to ash.

skins.name: PROJECT: Varus

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2021 PROJECT event.

skins.description: A replacement for the traitorous Ashe model, Varus is the latest in PROJECT Corporation's biological weapons... and a controversial experiment, with one body inhabited by three sentient minds. A Command Line counter-espionage operative acting on behalf of the PROJECT initiative, they work alongside the resistance to mitigate the risk posed by Mordekaiser to their corporate interests.

skins.name: Cosmic Hunter Varus

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

skins.description: A young member of the cosmic court, minted in the image of the Dark Star corruptant Varus. Tasked with destroying his monstrous doppelganger, this new Varus seeks his place among the stars after his task is finally complete.

skins.name: High Noon Varus

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the MSI 2022 High Noon event.

skins.description: Ain't nothin' for a dead angel to do but resign himself to grief. Varus was content to allow Mordekaiser to take him past the infernal gates themselves… Until a ragtag gang of thieves interrupted his mourning. Varus now picks up his bow once more, riding as a Harbinger. It's high time he got revenge for the massacre of Heaven.

skins.name: Snow Moon Varus

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.

skins.description: Blood Moon cultists drove Varus' comrades mad, forcing him to take their lives. Awash with grief, he begged the Snow Moon Order to numb the pain, to make him an instrument of ice cold revenge. The Order attempted to purify him of these heretical emotions… but Valmar and Kai's voices linger in his mind, and vengeance still smolders in his cold heart.

passive.name: Living Vengeance
passive.description: On kill or assist, Varus temporarily gains Attack Speed. This bonus is larger if the enemy is a champion.

spells.name: Piercing Arrow
spells.description: Varus readies and then fires a powerful shot that gains extra range and damage the longer he spends preparing to fire.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Begin Charging: Varus draws back his next shot, Slowing himself by @Effect7Amount*-100@%. After @Effect5Amount@ seconds, if not fired, Varus will cancel the Ability and refund @Effect4Amount*100@% of its Mana cost.

Release: Varus releases the arrow, dealing @TotalDamageMinTooltip@ physical damage, reduced by @Effect3Amount*100@% per enemy hit (minimum @Effect9Amount*100@%). Damage and Blight detonation effects are increased by up to @MaxChargeAmp*100@% based on charge time (maximum @TotalDamageMax@) .@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Blighted Quiver
spells.description: Passive: Varus' basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and apply Blight. Varus' other abilities detonate Blight, dealing magic damage based on the target's maximum Health. Active: Varus empowers his next Piercing Arrow.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Passive: Varus' Attacks deal an additional @OnHitDamage@ magic damage and apply a Blight stack for @Effect3Amount@ seconds (max @Effect4Amount@ stacks).

Varus' other Abilities detonate Blight stacks dealing @PercentHPPerStack@ max Health magic damage per stack (max @MaxPercentHPPerStack@ max Health damage). Detonating Blight on champions and epic monsters also reduces his basic Abilities' Cooldowns by @CDRPerBlightStack*100@% of their Maximum per stack.

Active: Varus' next Piercing Arrow deals an additonal @QEmpowerPercentHP@ missing Health magic damage, increased up to @MaxQEmpowerPercentHP@ missing Health damage based on charge time.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Hail of Arrows
spells.description: Varus fires a hail of arrows that deal physical damage and desecrate the ground. Desecrated ground slows enemies' Move Speed and reduces their self healing and regeneration.
spells.dynamicDescription: Varus fires a hail of arrows that deals <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ physical damage</physicalDamage> and desecrates the ground for @Effect3Amount@ seconds, <status>Slowing</status> enemies by @Effect2Amount*-100@% and applying @GrievousAmount*100@% Grievous Wounds.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Chain of Corruption
spells.description: Varus flings out a damaging tendril of corruption that immobilizes the first enemy champion hit and then spreads towards nearby uninfected champions, immobilizing them too on contact.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Varus flings out a tendril of corruption, Rooting the first champion hit for @Effect2Amount@ seconds and dealing @TotalDamage@ magic damage. Rooted enemies gain @Effect4Amount@ Blight stacks over the duration.

The corruption spreads from its target to uninfected enemy champions. If it reaches them, they take the same damage and Root.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@
